SocialProof.title: Trusted by the world's best affiliate marketers

FeaturesSection.title: A Suite of Tools, Unlimited Potential
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Everything you need to scale your affiliate operations, powered by the most advanced technology.

features.title: AI Landing Builder
features.description: Create high-converting sales and capture pages in minutes with our AI-guided builder.

features.title: AI Copywriter Pro
features.description: Generate persuasive copy for your ads, emails, and landing pages that connects with your audience and sells.

features.title: Predictive Analysis
features.description: Our AI analyzes your metrics and gives you clear insights to optimize your campaigns and maximize your ROI.

ProcessSteps.title: From Idea to Profit in 3 Simple Steps
ProcessSteps.description: We've streamlined the entire workflow, so you can focus on strategy, not on technical details.

steps.title: Build & Customize
steps.description: Select a high-converting template and customize it in minutes with our intuitive AI-powered drag-and-drop editor. No coding required.
checklist: Choose from a library of proven templates

steps.title: Launch & Distribute
steps.description: Publish your campaign to a fast, global edge network with a single click. Use our free subdomain or connect your own.

steps.title: Analyze & Optimize
steps.description: Our predictive analytics dashboard gives you clear, actionable insights. Understand your traffic and optimize for maximum ROI.

Testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Real results from real marketers who have supercharged their business with ConvertiKit.

testimonials.quote: ConvertiKit has been a game-changer for our agency. We've cut our campaign launch time by 90% and seen a significant uplift in conversions across the board. The AI copywriter alone is worth the price.

As a solo affiliate marketer, I don't have time for complex tools. ConvertiKit is incredibly intuitive and the predictive analytics help me make smarter decisions. My profits have doubled since I started using it.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact our support team.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that includes all the basic features to get you started. No credit card is required to sign up.

SupportCTA.title: Still Have Questions?
SupportCTA.description: Our dedicated support team is here to help you succeed. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, we've got your back.

BottomCTA.title: Ready to Skyrocket Your Conversions?
BottomCTA.subtitle: Join thousands of elite affiliates who are building faster, converting higher, and scaling their business with ConvertiKit.
BottomCTA.featuresTitle: Get started with everything you need:
BottomCTA.pricingNote: Free Forever. No credit card required.
